title: Public Holidays (Declaration) Notice, 2015
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 1
Gazette dated Monday, 12th January, 2015
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.1OF2015
The Public Holidays Act
(Laws,Volume15,Cap.272)
The Public Holidays (Declaration) Notice, 2015
INEXERCISEofthepowerscontainedinsectionthreeofthePublic
HolidaysAct,thefollowingNoticeisissued:
1. This Notice may be cited as the Public Holidays Title
(Declaration)Notice,2015.
2. It is declared that Tuesday, 20th January, 2015, shall be Declaration
observedasapublicholidayinviewofthepresidentialelectionto ofpublic
holiday
beheldonthatday.
DR GUYL.SCOTT,
LUSAKA Acting President
12thJanuary,2015
[CO.101/9/1]
.
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK2.00 each
2 Statutory Instruments 12th January,2015
